common.searchUsers: Search by username, email or name...
common.name: Full Name
common.dragDropFile: Drag and drop your file here
common.pageNotFoundDescription: The page you are looking for does not exist or the language is not supported.

auth.loginDescription: Exclusive access for platform administration. Users who wish to apply for job opportunities do not need to log in.

jobs.title: Job Opportunities
jobs.subtitle: Browse and apply to the latest job opportunities
jobs.errorLoadingJobs: Error loading opportunities. Please try again.
jobs.allFieldsRequired: All fields are required. Please fill in all information before submitting.
jobs.confirmDeleteJob: Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"?

users.title: Users
users.confirmInactivate: Are you sure you want to {action} {username}?
users.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete user {username}? This action cannot be undone.
users.confirmResetPassword: Are you sure you want to reset the password for {username}?
users.cannotDeleteSelf: You cannot delete your own account
users.cannotModifySelf: You cannot modify your own account from here
users.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

settings.title: Settings
settings.emailTestDescription: Test the internal email connection to verify that the backend can connect with the configured email settings.

profile.title: Profile
profile.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
profile.logoutWarning:
Are you sure you want to log out?

Your session will be closed and you will need to log in again to access the admin panel.
profile.passwordChangeWarning:
Are you sure you want to change your password?

After changing your password, your session will be closed and you will need to log in again with your new password.
profile.accountUpdateWarning:
You are about to modify sensitive information (username or email).

After updating, your session will be closed and you will need to log in again with your updated credentials.

footer.description: We are a platform designed to help you discover and apply to the best job opportunities in a simple, secure, and efficient way. We centralize the most relevant job openings in the market in one place, allowing you to connect with reliable employers who are looking for talent like yours.
footer.description2: Our goal is to accompany you in every step of your professional development, facilitating transparent processes and tools that help you make better career decisions and advance with confidence towards new growth opportunities.
footer.termsDescription: Review our terms and conditions to understand the rules and guidelines that govern the use of our platform.
footer.privacyDescription: Learn how we protect and manage your personal information in accordance with privacy regulations.
footer.contactDescription: For inquiries or support, please contact us through the available channels.
footer.contactInfo: We are here to help you find the perfect job opportunity. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us.
